mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum RNUM, TB.* FROM ( SELECT X.* FROM ( select a.ATCH_FILE_ID, substr(a.FILE_STRE_COURS, INSTR(a.FILE_STRE_COURS, '/',-1,3)) AS FILE_STRE_COURS, a.STRE_FILE_NM, a.FILE_EXTSN, a.CON_SEQ, a.FILE_ORDER, a.FILE_THUMNAIL , a.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, a.FILE_GUBUN , CASE WHEN a.FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp4', 'avi', 'mpeg') THEN 'MEDIA' WHEN a.FILE_EXTSN IN ('jpg', 'jpeg', 'gif', 'png', 'bmp') THEN 'IMAGE' WHEN a.FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp3', 'wav', 'mid') THEN 'MUSIC' END AS mediaType , a.PLAY_TIME, a.FILE_WIDTH , a.FILE_HEIGHT, a.UseYN from LETTNFILEDETAIL a where 1=1
and STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY a.ATCH_FILE_ID DESC )X where X.mediaType = 'MUSIC' and X.FILE_GUBUN = 'fileGubun02' and X.ATCH_FILE_ID not in (select ATCH_FILE_ID from TB_BRODBASICFILE where BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode}) ) TB ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}

select NVL(count(*),0) FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp4', 'avi', 'mpeg') THEN 'MEDIA' WHEN FILE_EXTSN IN ('jpg', 'jpeg', 'gif', 'png', 'bmp') THEN 'IMAGE' WHEN FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp3', 'wav', 'mid') THEN 'MUSIC' END AS mediaType, ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_GUBUN FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL where 1=1
and STRE_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
and ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
) X where X.mediaType = 'MUSIC' and X.FILE_GUBUN = 'fileGubun02' and X.ATCH_FILE_ID not in (select ATCH_FILE_ID from TB_BRODBASICFILE where BASIC_CODE = #{basicCode})

SELECT a.HIS_SEQ, b.SCH_CODE, e.CON_SEQ, e.DETAIL_SEQ, substr(d.FILE_STRE_COURS, (INSTR(d.FILE_STRE_COURS,'upload',1)-1)) AS FILE_STRE_COURS, d.ATCH_FILE_ID, d.STRE_FILE_NM, d.FILE_EXTSN, d.FILE_SIZE, e.TIME_INTERVAL, e.FILE_ORDER FROM TB_CONTENTSENDHISTORY a, TB_SCHEDULE b, TB_DIDINFO c , LETTNFILEDETAIL d , TB_CONTENTFILEINFO e, TB_CONDETAIL f
WHERE a.SCH_CODE = b.SCH_CODE AND a.DID_ID = c.DID_ID AND e.CON_SEQ = b.CONTENT_CODE AND e.ATCH_FILE_ID = d.ATCH_FILE_ID AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') >= b.SCH_STARTDAY AND b.SCH_ENDDAY >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND a.CON_PAGEUPDATECHECK = 'N' AND f.CON_SEQ = e.CON_SEQ AND f.DETAIL_SEQ = e.DETAIL_SEQ and c.DID_ID = #{didId} and B.SCH_USEYN = 'Y' AND b.SCH_CODE = #{schCode} GROUP BY a.HIS_SEQ, b.SCH_CODE, e.CON_SEQ, e.DETAIL_SEQ, d.FILE_STRE_COURS, d.ATCH_FILE_ID, d.STRE_FILE_NM, d.FILE_EXTSN, d.FILE_SIZE

select a.ATCH_FILE_ID, substr(a.FILE_STRE_COURS, (INSTR(a.FILE_STRE_COURS,'upload',1)-1)) AS FILE_STRE_COURS , STRE_FILE_NM, a.FILE_EXTSN, c.CON_SEQ, c.FILE_ORDER, a.FILE_SIZE, a.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, a.FILE_THUMNAIL, c.DETAIL_SEQ from LETTNFILEDETAIL a, TB_CONTENTMUTIL b, TB_CONTENTFILEINFO c where b.con_seq = #{conSeq} and a.ATCH_FILE_ID = c.ATCH_FILE_ID AND b.con_seq = c.con_seq order by c.FILE_ORDER asc

select ATCH_FILE_ID, substr(FILE_STRE_COURS, INSTR(FILE_STRE_COURS, '/',-1,3)) AS FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, CON_SEQ, FILE_ORDER, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_THUMNAIL from LETTNFILEDETAIL where DETAIL_SEQ = #{detailSeq} order by FILE_ORDER asc
select NVL(count(*),0) FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL WHERE DETAIL_SEQ = #{detailSeq}
select NVL(count(*),0) FROM LETTNFILEDETAIL WHERE con_seq = #{conSeq}
select a.ATCH_FILE_ID, a.ORIGNL_FILE_NM from LETTNFILEDETAIL a where UseYN ='Y' and FILE_EXTSN in ('mp3', 'wav', 'mid') order by ORIGNL_FILE_NM asc

SELECT b.con_seq, b.con_nm, COUNT(*) AS connCount FROM TB_CONTENTFILEINFO a, TB_CONTENTMUTIL b WHERE a.CON_SEQ = b.con_seq AND a.ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId} GROUP BY b.con_seq, b.con_nm ORDER BY con_seq ASC

select ATCH_FILE_ID, substr(FILE_STRE_COURS, INSTR(FILE_STRE_COURS, '/',-1,3)) AS FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE, CON_SEQ, FILE_ORDER, FILE_THUMNAIL , CASE WHEN FILE_EXTSN IN ('mp4', 'avi', 'mpeg') THEN 'MEDIA' WHEN FILE_EXTSN IN ('jpg', 'jpeg', 'gif', 'png', 'bmp') THEN 'IMAGE' END AS mediaType , FILE_WIDTH, FILE_HEIGHT , PLAY_TIME from LETTNFILEDETAIL where ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}
mapper.insert: insert into LETTNFILEDETAIL(ATCH_FILE_ID, FILE_STRE_COURS, STRE_FILE_NM, ORIGNL_FILE_NM, FILE_EXTSN, FILE_SIZE, FILE_THUMNAIL, PLAY_TIME, FILE_GUBUN, USEYN) values ( #{atchFileId} , #{fileStreCours}, #{streFileNm}, #{orignlFileNm}, #{fileExtsn} , #{fileSize}, #{fileThumnail ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{playTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR } , #{fileGubun, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, 'Y' )
mapper.update: update LETTNFILEDETAIL set FILE_STRE_COURS = #{fileStreCours}, STRE_FILE_NM = #{streFileNm}, ORIGNL_FILE_NM = #{orignlFileNm}, FILE_EXTSN = #{fileExtsn}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize}, FILE_THUMNAIL = #{fileThumnail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAY_TIME = #{playTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_GUBUN = #{fileGubun,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}
update LETTNFILEDETAIL set UseYN = #{useYn} where ATCH_FILE_ID = #{atchFileId}
